name: Shadows of a Sunless World
description:
You are Ekko, a being who perceives the world through echolocation.
Your people exiled you to the surface of your world to die, alone.
If you want to survive, you will have to avoid meeting
the path of your mortal enemies: Umbras.




Use the sounds of your steps to navigate an ancient ruin in this first-person horror game.
But be careful, Umbras are always on the lookout for unusual sounds in their territory.
To lure their prey, they imitate innocuous sounds, so look out for strangely behaving sounds around you.. . . . . . . . . CONTROLS . . . . . . . . .




This game is a student project made in four months for
our last year at CNAM-ENJMIN, France.
